column4: can someone please tell where to get the amd64 version of fuppes
i tits some thing todo with media sharing im trying tio set up wireless media sharing  and the walkthrough im using only gives command for 1386
looks like there are compile instructions for fuppes at http://fuppes.ulrich-voelkel.de/wiki/index.php?title=Compiling_on_Ubuntu_Linux
your welcome, it specifically mentions AMD64
